0.2.name: wordpress/force-login-except-special-ip-range
0.2.description: Forces all anonymous users to login except the user connects from special IPv4 ranges or a specific IPv4 address. This plugin was written to use wordpress in an intranet/internet environment. Users who are connecting from the intranet should see the blog without beeing forced to login. But users connection form the internet must log in to see the blog. Attention: Works only with IPv4! No IPv6 support!
